# kCGImagePropertyAuxiliaryDataType

**Global Variable**

The type of the auxiliary data.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCGImagePropertyAuxiliaryDataType: CFString
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFString]. The value of this key might be [doc://com.apple.imageio/documentation/ImageIO/kCGImageAuxiliaryDataTypeDisparity], [doc://com.apple.imageio/documentation/ImageIO/kCGImageAuxiliaryDataTypeDepth], or another auxiliary data type.

## Auxiliary Image Data

- **kCGImagePropertyAuxiliaryData**: An array of dictionaries that contain auxiliary data for the images.
- **kCGImageAuxiliaryDataInfoData**: The auxiliary data for the image.
- **kCGImageAuxiliaryDataInfoDataDescription**: A dictionary of keys that describe the auxiliary data.
- **kCGImageAuxiliaryDataInfoMetadata**: The metadata for any auxiliary data.
